name: Ricochet (itch)
description:
This game is part of an experiment to launch a new game every week.

Controls: WASD | ArrowsMoveRMBShootSpaceDashQ | ERotate Consider Supporting

There are several ways to support, including money or not.

Any donation is greatly appreciated and allows me to continue developing. You can do this by supporting on Patreon and gaining access to exclusive rewards - including game source files.

Share with your friends on your social media pages, it doesn’t cost money and this helps me to keep it going

Thank you for supporting!
 Games • Patreon • Twitter • Discord
